name: Panasonic Bluray
description:
An ancient relic. A band of misfits. An eldritch god. Explore the secrets of the majestic world. 

Panasonic Bluray is an IWBTG fangame. It is not as difficult as other games in the subgenre so I encourage non-fangamers to give it a shot.

Before you ask, this game is about this commercial. I know.

This game contains assets that are not mine. All original owners have been credited in the read-me file. 

REGARDING WHICH VERSION TO DOWNLOAD: Both versions of the game are the same, but have different soundtracks. Both versions can be streamed; however, the B-SIDE has no risk of a DMCA claim while the A-SIDE may have a slight risk. For casual play, download the A-SIDE. Please contact me/leave a comment if you have any questions. 

If you have any problems with anything related to this game, contact me on Twitter.
